=== How to submit wallpapers to the 14.04 wallpaper contest ===

1. After you've read the guidelines and prepared your artwork for upload, first <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers/Submissions?action=AttachFile|head over to the attachments]]</nowiki> of the submission page.
2. Upload your wallpaper with this name-format: "authorname_wallpapername.jpg" ("jpg" is only an example filename extension, obviously it can also be svg, png etc.)
3. After you've successfully uploaded your wallpaper, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers/Submissions?action=edit&editor=text|edit the page-contents]]</nowiki>.
4. Then copy-paste this template-text and update it with your information:
<code>=== Wallpaper Name ===</code><<BR>>
<code><nowiki>[[attachment:authorname_wallpapername.jpg|<nowiki>[[File:authorname_wallpapername.jpg|Wallpaper Name|width=250]]</nowiki></nowiki>]]</code><<BR>>
<code>  '''Author:''' Author Name</code><<BR>>
<code>  '''License:''' CC-BY-SA</code><<BR>>
<code>  '''Resolution:''' width x height</code><<BR>>
1.#5 Then save the page and you're done.
6. Patiently wait for your submission <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers/Accepted|to be accepted]]</nowiki>.
